document_data.mainbody:
Peuter Marsk was the master of House Marsk and the elected Despot of Melvaunt in 1374 DR.
Peuter sponsored many of the citys improvement projects, including the troubled sewer project in order to gain the populations appreciation.
Peuters son Elaint Marsk went on adventures with some friends and disappeared. Lord Woarsten Nanther hired an adventuring party to find the noble scions.
Peuter was worried by the relationship between Elaint and Kara Calaudra.
